s: Summary: OSN – Race to the Future showcases the Open Stable Network’s on‑chain FX settlement platform at Happy Valley Racecourse, highlighting borderless money movement.
Topics: On‑chain FX, stablecoin‑fiat bridges, API integration, global liquidity, cross‑jurisdictional compliance.
Speakers: OSN executives, Web3 Harbour leaders, Leadsourcing B2B representatives.
r: Explore a unified API for real‑time cross‑border stablecoin FX.
Understand compliance mechanisms for multi‑jurisdictional settlements.
Network with institutions seeking resilient, on‑chain payment rails.
